name: Tuyen An (Annie)
about: A strong interpersonal HR Professional, Trainer, Coach with more than 10 years of experience with a genuine interest and passion in talent recruitment & talent development.

experiences.description:
helped me get this job
LinkedIn helped me get this job
experiences.position_title: Cluster Lead, Talent Acquisition (VN, Cambodia & Myanmar)

experiences.institution_name: Ngân hàng TMCP Sài Gòn - SCB

experiences.description:
 Lead, coach, build, develop & inspire high performing talent acquisition department while driving a high level of performance against our aggressive hiring plans. Works with team members to develops and implement recruiting plans to staff open requisitions while minimizing cost per hire.
 Enrich talent pool & diversifying sourcing strategies, create innovative programs, events, and campaigns to generate awareness, build candidate pipeline, innovative candidate sourcing strategies. and drive campus recruiting efforts that align with recruitment goals.
 Manages recruiting process operations and holds talent acquisition team members accountable for delivering consistent and efficient practices across the nationwide FE Credit footprint.
 Build a data-driven recruiting organization, developing recruiting relative metrics and analytic that provide insights, drive decision making, and measure team productivity 
 Develop effective working relationships and partner with business leaders at all levels of the organization to understand needs and provide consultation on talent acquisition strategies and challenges.
 Create a candidate-centric environment, advocating for insider advancement, Know & Transfer recruitment knowledge and interview skill to HM
 Convert the passive and potential candidates into leads and active candidates mode.
 Streamline, simplify and automate hiring process, making it faster and more efficient, apply face& voice reading for analysis & predict PI
 Responsible for talent acquisition reporting, trend analysis, talent acquisition digitization & transformation in order to win talent wars.
